Subject: A fiery Dawn! - HYDRAS
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=435352480; y=hdX_ONw8Uvq78ZFKBdbYoI3oSgYccVeUJ1h7b1ErfsfV15d7q6Wenw
X-Yahoo-Profile: supercyclonus

DARKNESS!

For a long while that is all HYDRAS knew. Dakness, pain and even a
strange sense of loneliness as if he has lost someone or something,
but he is not sure what.

For HYDRAS there was only the sensation of floating in water, his body
moving and swaying. A curious situation since as far as his internal
diagnotics were telling him he had no body, no frame. It was like he
were caught in some sort of dream state.

For a moment he could see the world of EARTH, the entirety of it, the
length and breadth of it. it seemed far older than he remembered it
and yet strangely younger. He could see the energy it held, the
kingdoms that would one day rise and fall all over the course of
thousands and millions of years.

Then he could see that the legions on the world were not humans but
CYBERTRONIANS all of them with the PREDACON and even DECEPTICON logos
on their chestplates.

But there was somehting different about it, and then it hit, the
CYBERTRONIANS, the PREDACONS and the MAXIMALS were all large sized 30,
40 some even 50 feet tall.

"All of this could be yours." Said a dark and unknown voice to HYDRAS
from somewhere that he could not see. "All you must do is be my
follower."

"What do you say Hydras?" The voice had an arrogant curiousity to it.
"think upon it. Hydras. Until then I have given you a gift."

"Hydras . . . "

                          " . . . Hydras? . . . "

LIGHT!!

A sudden radiance seemed to peer into HYDRAS' world.

                                                               " . . .
Hydras . . "

"Hydras!" There was another voice now, this one more familiar, it was
JHIAXUS! "Wake up!"


HYDRAS' internals were now registering a body and a form different
from his original but one definitly powerful! His systems were slowly
rebooting themselves and powering up and his sensors were only telling
him that he was in a room of some sort with two individuals. JHIAXUS
and SCORPONOK.

These two had disappeared a long while back. Where had they been all
this time, and what and why were they here now?

(TAG)

- Preston
